column4: I would not ask in here, even if normally all answers are also 100% comaptible
Understood. It was completely a mistake, I should have looked at the context of your comment before saying anything.
with the sound mixer applet ubuntu uses it is really a difference, so guess this is the 0.5%
never mind, actually I found out in this case gnome-volume-control-applet does nothing and I don't know what the applet is called in Ubuntu, so actually true
